ygData.subject: PreNatal Wizard
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I m finally going to break down and seriously play a spellcasting class.  Of course due to the raw power of the class, as well as the versatility of
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I'm finally going to break down and seriously play a spellcasting
class. Of course due to the raw power of the class, as well as the
versatility of teleportation, Wizards are my first choice. I realize that
people have most likely time and again requested spell lists, but here I am,
brand spanking new to the list. I was wondering if perhaps some nice soul
out there might be able to send me a complete list. I've checked EQLizer,
EQVault, and EQstratics and none of them have every spell, thanks in advance
everyone.
